title: Game stuck at loading screen
body:
Ive been having this issue for about 2 weeks, and that stopped me completely from playing league which pissed me off.
When i load into champ select, everything is usually fine, but then it takes me about 3 min to get into the loading screen, but when i CTRL + ALT + DEL to open my task manager, the current state of league is "not responding", it takes me like 5 min for the champs to show up in the loading screen, then another 2 min for me to get into the game, and the timer was already at 5 mins or so, and my team are flaming me for afk, while i need to deal with this issue, but in game i dont get any ping issues or anything else, when i finish a game i get a leaverbuster and it just makes me quit league
I have tried reinstalling league, but thats just no use
I really want to play league again, so does anyone else have this issue, or any solutions?

Thanks

replies.body: Same issue happens to me. I can't even turn off the cliend in task manager window... It is just stuck at loading window(i hear the game starting). Lost 5 games cus of this issue... Lost mmr/Time/grind... I'm pissed cus of this... Connection issues? I doubt that's the problem. It happened after new windows update... One more bug/// Not seeing healthbar of enemy/ally/myn champion or names above their character. My graphic drivers are up to date/internet connection is the same from last year/windows up to date.

It definitely sounds like you're experiencing a *poor or unstable connection* to our gameservers. This could be due to a number of different reasons, but these issues most commonly occur if there are incompatible settings on your network. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through some configuration changes you can make that may resolve these issues.

Please let me know if this helped.

I'm having the exact same problem. It's come out of nowhere, even though nothing on my network has changed.. I can't get into any game because my team will surrender before I can even load in. Sick of losing LP because of server issues :/
